roles.title: Discover the Roles
roles.subtitle: Each role has unique powers. Master them all to dominate the game.
roles.classic_desc: The essential roles of the base game
roles.create_hint: Use the form below to create one
roles.login_hint: Login as a server admin to create custom roles
roles.phrase_redirect_chosen: redirect an attack to another target
roles.phrase_double_vote_chosen: grant a double vote to a player
roles.phrase_immune_chosen: make a player immune to attacks
roles.phrase_win_override_self: set their own special win condition
roles.phrase_win_override_auto: automatically apply a special win condition
roles.phrase_swap_chosen: swap the roles of two players
roles.phrase_swap_self: swap their role with another player
roles.err_passive_kill: Cannot have a permanent passive kill ability.
roles.err_death_protect: Protecting someone after your own death is not possible.
roles.err_death_immune: Becoming immune after death makes no sense.
roles.mode_advanced_hint: Advanced mode enabled ‚Äî full technical editing
roles.err_name_length: Name must be between 1 and 50 characters
roles.err_charges_invalid: Invalid charges for an ability (between 1 and 99)
roles.strat_empty: Add abilities to see the strategic analysis

desc.WEREWOLF: Each night, the werewolves gather to devour a villager.
desc.SEER: Each night, the seer can discover a player's role.
desc.WITCH: Has a life potion and a death potion, each usable once.
desc.HUNTER: When dying, the hunter can take another player down.
desc.CUPID: Chooses two lovers at the start. If one dies, so does the other.
desc.PETITE_FILLE: Can spy on the werewolves at night, at the risk of being caught.
desc.VILLAGER: A simple villager with no special power. Must unmask the wolves.
desc.IDIOT: If voted out by the village, he is revealed but loses his voting rights.
desc.SALVATEUR: Each night, protects a player from the werewolves' attack.
desc.ANCIEN: Survives the first werewolf attack thanks to his resilience.
desc.WHITE_WOLF: Plays solo. Hunts with the pack but can devour a wolf every other night. Wins if last standing.
desc.THIEF: Discovers 2 cards at the start and can swap his role. If both are wolves, he must take one.

docs.title: üìö Werewolf Bot ‚Äî Complete Wiki
docs.subtitle: Everything you need to know about playing, configuring and mastering Werewolf on Discord.
docs.overview_text: Werewolf Bot is a complete Discord implementation of the classic Werewolf (Mafia) party game. Players are secretly assigned roles ‚Äî some are villagers trying to survive, others are werewolves hunting at night. By day, the village debates and votes to eliminate suspected wolves. The game alternates between night and day until a side wins.
docs.feature_1: 12 unique roles across 3 camps (Village, Wolves, Solo)
docs.feature_2: Automatic voice channel management (muting/unmuting per phase)
docs.feature_3: Private channels for wolves, seer, witch, and other special roles
docs.feature_4: Captain election and special death mechanics
docs.feature_5: Lover system with Cupid for romantic entanglements
docs.feature_6: ELO ranking, achievements, and progression system
docs.feature_8: Real-time web dashboard with spectator mode
docs.flow_d1: An admin runs /setup to configure the bot for the server
docs.flow_d2: A player uses /create. Others join with /join (minimum 4 players)
docs.flow_d3: The host uses /start ‚Äî roles are secretly assigned via DM
docs.flow_d4: Private channels are created for wolves, seer, witch, etc.
docs.flow_d5: Night phase: special roles act in order (Thief ‚Üí Cupid ‚Üí Guardian ‚Üí Wolves ‚Üí White Wolf ‚Üí Witch ‚Üí Seer)
docs.flow_d6: Day phase: deaths announced, captain vote, deliberation, then village vote
docs.flow_d7: The cycle repeats until a victory condition is met
docs.setup_1: Invite the bot to your server with admin permissions
docs.setup_2: Run /setup ‚Äî this launches an interactive wizard
docs.setup_3: The wizard creates: a game category, a main text channel, and a voice channel
docs.setup_5: Choose a language with /lang fr or /lang en
docs.dist_1: Minimum 4 players to start a game
docs.dist_2: Wolf count: ~‚Öì of players (1 for 4-5, 2 for 6-8, 3 for 9-11, 4 for 12+)
docs.dist_3: Special roles added in priority: Seer ‚Üí Witch ‚Üí Hunter ‚Üí Cupid ‚Üí Guardian ‚Üí Little Girl ‚Üí Elder ‚Üí Idiot
docs.dist_4: Remaining slots are filled with Villagers
docs.dist_5: White Wolf replaces one regular wolf if enabled and 8+ players
docs.dist_7: Configurable: admins can enable/disable specific roles via /setrules
docs.night_desc: During the night, the village sleeps (all voice-muted). Special roles act in strict order via their private channels.
docs.day_desc: At dawn, night deaths are announced. The village then debates and votes.
docs.afk_text: Players who don't act within 120 seconds during their night phase will have their action auto-skipped.
docs.captain_1: The captain is elected on the first day via /captainvote
docs.captain_3: If the captain dies, they choose a successor
docs.captain_4: In case of a tie, the captain breaks the tie
docs.win_village_desc: All werewolves have been eliminated. The village celebrates!
docs.win_wolves_desc: Wolves equal or outnumber the remaining villagers.
docs.win_white_wolf_desc: The White Wolf is the absolute last player standing.
docs.win_lovers_desc: The two lovers (from different camps) are the last ones standing. Love conquers all!
docs.win_draw_desc: No players remain, or the game cannot continue.
docs.ach_immortal_req: Survive a wolf attack as Elder
docs.elo_desc: Every player starts at 1000 ELO. Winning increases your rating, losing decreases it. Your tier is determined by your ELO range.
docs.act_thief: Choose one of 2 revealed cards to swap role
docs.act_witch: Use heal or kill potion (once each)
docs.trans_1: All night actions are resolved (wolf kill, witch potions, guardian protection)
docs.trans_2: Deaths are announced with role reveals
docs.trans_4: Hunter death shot is triggered if applicable (90s timer)
docs.trans_6: Voice channels unmuted for all surviving players
docs.trans_7: Vote result is applied (elimination or tie = no kill)
docs.trans_10: Voice channels muted for all players
docs.cmd_create: Create a new game lobby in the current channel
docs.cmd_start: Start the game (lobby host only, min 4 players)
docs.cmd_help: Display help information and available commands
docs.cmd_status: Show current game status, phase and alive players
docs.cmd_stats: View stats, ranking points and achievements
docs.cmd_kill: Vote to devour a player (wolf channel)
docs.cmd_potion_kill: Kill any player with death potion (1 use)
docs.cmd_protect: Shield a player from wolf attack
docs.cmd_vote: Vote to eliminate a player from the village
docs.cmd_captainvote: Vote for captain (first day or succession)
docs.cmd_shoot: Hunter fires last shot upon death
docs.cmd_setup: Interactive setup wizard ‚Äî creates category, channels, rules
docs.cmd_setrules: Configure game rules (wolf count, enabled roles, timers)
docs.cmd_lang: Set the bot language for this server
docs.cmd_clear: Remove game channels and clean up
docs.cmd_nextphase: Force advance to the next phase
docs.to_night_afk: Auto-skip if player doesn't act during their night phase
docs.to_hunter: Time for Hunter to choose a target after death
docs.to_vote: Time window for village elimination vote
docs.lovers_1: Cupid designates 2 lovers on Night 1 with /love
docs.lovers_2: Lovers are notified via DM and can see each other's identity
docs.lovers_3: If one lover dies, the other immediately dies of heartbreak
docs.lovers_4: If lovers are from different camps (e.g. Wolf + Villager), they can win together as a couple if they're the last 2 standing
docs.wolf_v1: Wolves vote individually with /kill @player in their private channel
docs.wolf_v2: All wolves must agree on the same target (consensus)
docs.wolf_v3: If wolves can't agree within the timeout (120s), no one is killed
docs.wolf_v4: Wolves cannot target each other (except White Wolf's solo action)
docs.elder_1: The Elder has 2 lives against wolf attacks
docs.elder_2: If the village votes to eliminate the Elder, ALL special villager roles lose their powers
docs.elder_3: This is permanent for the rest of the game ‚Äî a devastating penalty
docs.elder_4: The Witch's death potion kills the Elder outright (bypasses extra life)
docs.voice_1: Players are server-muted during Night phase (no cheating!)
docs.voice_2: Players are unmuted during Day phase for discussion
docs.voice_4: All mutes are automatically removed when the game ends
docs.death_1: When a player dies, their role is publicly revealed
docs.death_2: Dead players enter spectator mode (can watch but not communicate)
docs.death_3: The Hunter's death triggers an immediate /shoot prompt
docs.death_4: Lover death chains resolve immediately (can cause cascading deaths)
docs.ach_guardian_angel_req: Save a player 3 times as Guardian
docs.ach_night_owl_req: Survive 10 nights in a single game
docs.role_werewolf: Each night the werewolves gather in a private channel and vote on a victim to devour using /kill. They must reach consensus. During the day, they pretend to be villagers.
docs.role_white_wolf: Appears as a werewolf and hunts with the pack normally. But every other night, can also secretly kill one of the other wolves. Wins only if he's the absolute last player standing ‚Äî a true solo predator.
docs.role_villager: A simple villager with no special power. Must use deduction, observation and voting to unmask the wolves. The backbone of the village team.
docs.role_seer: Each night, the seer can use /see to discover one player‚Äôs true role. Vital information for the village, but must stay hidden from the wolves.
docs.role_witch: Possesses two potions, each usable once per game: a life potion to save the wolves‚Äô victim, and a death potion to kill any player. Learns who the wolves targeted each night.
docs.role_hunter: When the hunter dies (by any cause), he fires a last shot and can take another player down with him. Has 90 seconds to choose a target.
docs.role_cupid: On the very first night, Cupid designates two lovers with /love. If one lover dies, the other dies of a broken heart. If the lovers are from opposite camps, they win together as a unique pair.
docs.role_salvateur: Each night, the Guardian protects one player from the werewolves‚Äô attack. Cannot protect the same player two nights in a row.
docs.role_petite_fille: Can spy on the werewolves at night using /listen, seeing fragments of their conversation. Risky ‚Äî if the wolves notice her, they can target her.
docs.role_ancien: Survives the first werewolf attack thanks to his resilience (has 2 lives against wolves). If killed by the village vote, all special villager powers are drained for the rest of the game.
docs.role_idiot: If voted out by the village during the day, the Idiot is revealed but survives ‚Äî however, he permanently loses his right to vote. Dies normally to wolf attacks.
docs.role_thief: At the start of the game, the Thief sees 2 extra role cards dealt face-up. He can choose to swap his role for one of them. If both cards are werewolves, he MUST take one. Acts during the very first night before all other roles.

premium.title: Werewolf Premium
premium.hero_sub: Elevate your Werewolf experience to legendary status
premium.compare_sub: See the difference at a glance
premium.features_sub: Everything you need for the ultimate Werewolf experience
premium.feat_roles_desc: Unlock 6 premium roles: White Wolf, Cupid, Savior, Elder, Village Idiot, and Thief.
premium.feat_themes_desc: Transform your game visuals with 15 handcrafted themes ‚Äî from Blood Moon to Enchanted Forest.
premium.feat_sounds_desc: Immersive audio: wolf howls at night, church bells at dawn, dramatic vote reveals.
premium.feat_stats_desc: Win rates per role, heat maps, kill chains, and exportable CSV reports.
premium.feat_priority_desc: Direct line to our dev team. Bugs fixed in hours, not days.
premium.feat_badges_desc: Golden crown badge on leaderboards, profile, and in-game mentions.
premium.feat_custom_desc: Design entirely new roles with custom abilities, camps, and win conditions.
premium.feat_scenarios_desc: Pre-built game scenarios with unique rules, twists, and win conditions.
premium.pricing_sub: Flexible plans for every werewolf pack
premium.btn_hint: Premium plans will be available after bot stabilization.
premium.wip_badge: Premium is currently in preparation ‚Äî stay tuned!
premium.testi_1: "The premium roles completely changed our games. White Wolf creates amazing plot twists!"
premium.testi_2: "Sound effects make it 10x more immersive. My friends can't stop playing."
premium.testi_3: "Custom roles let us build scenarios we never thought possible. Worth every cent."
premium.faq_q1: How do I activate Premium after payment?
premium.faq_a1: Once paid, your Discord account is instantly linked. Premium features activate within seconds.
premium.faq_q2: Can I use Premium on multiple servers?
premium.faq_a2: Yes! Premium is tied to your Discord account and works on all servers where the bot is installed.
premium.faq_a3: Absolutely. Cancel anytime with no questions asked. You keep access until the end of your billing period.
premium.faq_a4: We are currently stabilizing the bot core features. Premium plans will be activated once the experience is solid and reliable.
premium.final_sub: We're preparing something exceptional. Stay tuned for the launch!

login.feat_roles: Create custom roles for your server
login.note: Read-only access is available without login

support.title: Support & Resources
support.subtitle: Need help? We've got you covered. Find answers, contact us, or explore our resources.
support.github_desc: Source code, bug reports, feature requests, and contributions.
support.discord_desc: Community server for live help, announcements, and discussions.
support.docs_desc: Complete wiki with all roles, commands, mechanics, and configuration options.
support.premium_desc: Unlock exclusive roles, themes, sounds and advanced features.
support.commands_sub: Essential commands to get you started
support.cmd_create: Create a new game in the current server
support.cmd_join: Join the lobby of the current game
support.cmd_start: Start the game when enough players are ready
support.cmd_setup: Interactive wizard to configure the bot
support.cmd_stats: View your ELO rating and game stats
support.faq_q1: How do I invite the bot to my server?
support.faq_a1: Use the invite link from the GitHub repository or the bot's profile. The bot needs Administrator permissions to manage channels, roles, and voice muting.
support.faq_q2: What is the minimum number of players?
support.faq_a2: You need at least 4 players to start a game. For the best experience with all roles, 8-12 players is recommended.
support.faq_q3: How do I change the language?
support.faq_a3: Use the /lang command followed by "fr" for French or "en" for English. This changes the bot's language for the entire server.
support.faq_q4: Can I customize which roles are in the game?
support.faq_a4: Yes! Use /setrules to enable or disable specific roles, change wolf count, and configure other game options per server.
support.faq_q5: Why are my players not being muted/unmuted?
support.faq_a5: Make sure the bot has the "Mute Members" permission. Players also need to be connected to the game's voice channel for voice management to work.
support.faq_q6: The game is stuck, what do I do?
support.faq_a6: An admin can use /nextphase to force advance, or /force-end to end the game immediately. Use /clear to clean up channels.
support.faq_q7: How does the ELO system work?
support.faq_a7: Every player starts at 1000 ELO. Winning increases your rating and losing decreases it. Your tier (Iron ‚Üí Alpha Wolf) is determined by your range. Use /stats to check.
support.contact_sub: Our community is always ready to help. Join our Discord server or open an issue on GitHub.

invite.title: Add Werewolf Bot

invite.hero_desc: Immerse your server in the Werewolf universe. Betrayal, strategy, and guaranteed laughs.
invite.deck_sub: Discover game roles by drawing from the deck.
invite.features_sub: A complete bot designed for fun and competition.
invite.feat_game_d: Automated day/night phases, votes, night actions and captain management.
invite.feat_roles_d: Seer, Witch, Hunter, Cupid, White Wolf, Thief, and many more.
invite.feat_voice_d: Automatic mute/unmute of players at night. Full immersion guaranteed.
invite.feat_stats_d: Competitive ranking, history, achievements and detailed statistics.
invite.feat_lang_d: Full French and English support. Switch language with /lang.
invite.feat_dash_d: Full web interface to manage your games, stats and bot configuration.
invite.perms_sub: The bot only requests the permissions strictly necessary for the game.
invite.cta_desc: Install the bot in one click and start your first game in seconds.

desc.sharpshooter: Kill a wolf as Hunter on death
desc.immortal: Survive a wolf attack as Elder

gh.confirm_delete: Permanently delete this game from history?

gr.err_max_range: Max must be between min and 20

iv.desc_werewolf: Each night, the werewolves gather to devour a villager. They must remain discreet to avoid being unmasked.
iv.desc_villager: A simple villager with no special power. They must use logic and intuition to unmask the werewolves.
iv.desc_seer: Each night, the seer can peer into a player's soul and discover their true identity.
iv.desc_witch: She has two potions: one for healing and one for poisoning, each usable only once.
iv.desc_hunter: Upon death, the hunter fires a final shot and takes a player of their choice to the grave.
iv.desc_white_wolf: A lone wolf who plays for himself. Every other night, he can devour another werewolf.
iv.desc_little_girl: Curious and fearless, she can spy on the werewolves' council during the night.
iv.desc_cupid: At the start of the game, Cupid designates two lovers bound by fate. If one dies, the other follows.
iv.desc_guardian: Each night, he places a player under his protection, making them invulnerable to the wolves' attack.
iv.desc_elder: His wisdom grants exceptional resilience: he survives the first werewolf attack.
iv.desc_idiot: If voted out by the village, he is revealed and spared but permanently loses his voting rights.
iv.desc_thief: At the start of the game, he discovers two cards and can choose one to swap his role.
